title: You'll Want To Accept The Dinner Invitation To 'The Immortal Evening'
teaser: On a cold evening in London in 1817, painter Benjamin Haydon hosted a dinner with the likes of Keats and Wordsworth. Critic Stanley Plumly recreates the crackling conversation about art and science.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
